oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Flossie B. Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait of Flossie B. Jackson, Nashville, Tenn., 1899

Flossie B. Jackson graduated from Pharmaceutical Department at Central Tennessee College in 1900. She also passed the examinations of the State Board of Pharmacy the same year, becoming a registered pharmacist. She was a member of the Tennessee Pharmaceutical Association and worked at Jackson's Drug Store in Memphis, which was owned by her brother, Dr. George R. Jackson.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jackson, Flossie B.
